entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is the one who successfully disarmed Harry with Expelliarmus spell.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person whose wand was disarmed by Neville.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the people who will practice with Neville and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the people who will practice with Neville and Ron.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: Zacharias Smith is the person whose wand keeps flying out of his hand when he tries to disarm Anthony Goldstein.

entities.name: anthony goldstein
entities.description: Anthony Goldstein is the person who Zacharias Smith is trying to disarm, but Fred and George are interfering with the spell.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twins who are interfering with Zacharias' spell by pointing their wands at his back.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is the other twin who is interfering with Zacharias' spell by pointing his wand at his back.

relationships.description: Neville disarmed Harry with the Expelliarmus spell.
Zacharias Smith is trying to disarm Anthony Goldstein, but Fred and George are interfering with the spell.
Fred is pointing his wand at Zacharias' back to interfere with his spell.
George is also pointing his wand at Zacharias' back to interfere with his spell.
